full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,'PHAGS PA BZANG PO SPYOD PA'I SMON LAM GYI 'DON THABS DGE LEGS KUN 'BYUNG ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @008A *, ,(CES 'PHAGS PA BZANG PO SPYOD PA'I SMON LAM GYI 'DON THABS DGE LEGS KUN 'BYUNG ZHES BYA BA 'DI NI TSA HAR GU LU AU L'AN SHOG GI SOS NOG SUM MI BSTAN PA DAR RGYAS GLING GI T'A BLA MA DGE BA'I BSOD NAMS MNGON PAR MTHO ZHING CHOS SBYIN MANGS PA MED KEN CHOS RJE DAM CHOS BZANG POS BSKUL NGOR, SH'AKYA'I BTZUN PA MI NYAG TSUL KHRIMS BSTAN PA'I NYI MAS SO NYING GAS SE TU'I RING JUN WANG RATNA SIDDHI'I SKU MCHED MKHAN PO BLA MA'I LHA KHANG PHUN TSOGS 'DOD 'JOR SBYAR BA'I YI GE PA NI DRUNG YIG GI DGE SLONG TSUL KHRIMS BSTAN 'DZIN NO, ,BKRA SHIS DPAL 'BAR 'DZAM GLING RGYAN DU BYON, ,DGE LEGS 'PHEL BAR 'GYUR CIG ,)
author_simple: TSUL KHRIMS BSTAN PA'I NYI MA,
